title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Constructivist Pre-Service Teacher Training for Technology-Enhanced Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Participants develop three or more T-PACK (Technology, Pedagogy, Content, Knowledge) integrated instructional designs using collaboration tools within 8 weeks
Learners improve their design proposals two or more times through peer feedback and social scaffolding
Trainees lead five or more asynchronous online discussions applying constructivist teaching methods in collaborative environments
Participants demonstrate a 75% or greater improvement in technology-enhanced learning design skills through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
